title: Stay-at-home order legal, Idaho attorney general says
description: BOISE, Idaho (AP) — Gov. Brad Little’s stay-at-home order to limit the spread of the coronavirus is legal and clearly defined by law, Idaho Attorney General Lawrence Wasden said.
content:
BOISE, Idaho (AP) Gov. Brad Littles stay-at-home order to limit the spread of the coronavirus is legal and clearly defined by law, Idaho Attorney General Lawrence Wasden said.
Wasden said the Republican governors power to assert such an order is found within… [+851 chars]
